name: WSJ
text:
RT @JoannaStern: We are all going to die. 

Before we do, we should think about the tech we leave behind to tell our stories + what will happen to our digital stuff. 

That's what my new documentary, "E-ternal: A Tech Quest to 'Live' Forever," is about. 

FULL FILM HERE: https://t.co/thh2UuLsa2 https://t.co/XcZuvIV5Xn
